title: Define System Architecture
description: Design the overall structure of SmartFarmingDrones system, including hardware, software, and communication protocols.

title: Develop Autonomous Navigation System
description: Create an autonomous navigation system for drones that can map fields and fly over them efficiently.

title: Implement Crop Health Monitoring Sensors
description: Design and integrate sensors into the drones to monitor crop health parameters like moisture, temperature, and color.

title: Optimize Resource Allocation Algorithms
description: Develop algorithms to optimize resource use in agriculture based on the collected crop health data.

title: Create User Interface for Data Visualization
description: Design a user-friendly interface to visualize the collected crop health data and optimized resource allocation.

title: Develop Quality Assurance Plan
description: Create a plan to ensure the quality of the SmartFarmingDrones system throughout its development.

title: Perform Security Audit of the System
description: Conduct a thorough security audit to ensure the SmartFarmingDrones system is secure against potential vulnerabilities.
